name: QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT
description:
A game about LOVE and DROIDS. Because we LOVE DROIDS!

A lonely droid Floor-E tries to program and wake up his beloved droidess E.V. NT. Will he succeed or will he actually create a loveless cybernetic monster?

A logical-psychological-space-base-crawler for one, very lonely player.

Game made during Warsaw Film School Game Jam at Warsaw.

'Digital Love' arranged and performed by Liz Katrin @LizKatrinMusic.

Download below.

SHORT INSTRUCTIONS:

Arrow keys move our droid.

Find screens on the walls - these are the terminals containing the trait discs.

Collect and move disc using arrows and Enter to select.

Try to match your traits (colours) of the personality graph with traits of robo-girl.

Test each disc before loading moving them on ? sign.

You can reset the personality of robo-girl but mind the number of trait disc is finite.

Fill up the memory core of robo-girl then RUN her program. Hope for the best!

Have fun.
